trans-unit.source: Describes a color in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.
trans-unit.target: Descreve uma cor em termos de canais alfa, vermelho, verde e azul.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *predefinedColor*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedColor*

trans-unit.source: One of the colors predefined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma das cores predefinidas o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> classe.

trans-unit.source: *rgb*
trans-unit.target: *rgb*

trans-unit.source: A three-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: Um número hexadecimal de três dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro dígito que especifica a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> de valor, o segundo dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> valor e o terceiro dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `00F`.

trans-unit.source: *argb*
trans-unit.target: *argb*

trans-unit.source: A four-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: Um número hexadecimal de quatro dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro dígito que especifica a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> de valor, o segundo dígito especifica seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> de valor, o próximo dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> valor e o dígito final especifica seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `F00F`.

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb*
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb*

trans-unit.source: A six-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: Um número hexadecimal de seis dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Os dois primeiros dígitos especificar a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> valor, especifique as próximas duas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> valor e os dois finais especificam seus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *aarrggbb*
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb*

trans-unit.source: An eight-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: Um número hexadecimal de oito dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Os dois primeiros dígitos especificar a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> valor, especifique as próximas duas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> valor, especifique as próximas duas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> valor e os dois finais especificam seus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `FF0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *scA*
trans-unit.target: *scA*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: A cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: *scR*
trans-unit.target: *scR*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: A cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: *scG*
trans-unit.target: *scG*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: A cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: *scB*
trans-unit.target: *scB*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: A cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: *profileUri*
trans-unit.target: *profileUri*

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] perfil de cor.

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue*
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue*

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de cor de canal alfa.

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valores é de 0,0 a 1,0.

trans-unit.source: *colorValue*
trans-unit.target: *colorValue*

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista delimitada por vírgulas de três a oito valores que representam os canais de cor do perfil de cor.

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valores é de 0,0 a 1,0.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use sRGB, ScRGB, and color profile values to create the color blue.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como usar sRGB ScRGB e valores de perfil de cor para criar a cor azul.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal alfa <see langword="sRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha channel value of the color, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: O valor de canal alfa <see langword="sRGB" /> da cor, um valor entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura determina a quantidade de transparência de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> tem.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 255 indica a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> é completamente opaco e um valor de 0 indica que a cor é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the ScRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e os canais ScRGB (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, o `sRGB` canal alfa, é modificado, o `ScRGB` canal alfa, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas são adicionadas juntos, adicionando os canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de primeiro para os canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de segundo.

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o canal alfa de `color1` e o canal alfa de `color2` são adicionados juntos para produzir o canal alfa da cor resultante.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é feito com os canais vermelhos, verdes e azuis para produzir canais de vermelho, verdes e azuis a nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The first color to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira cor a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second color to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda cor a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures for fuzzy equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara a igualdade difusa de duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are nearly identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="color1" /> e <paramref name="color2" /> são quase idênticas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This equality method compensates for the fact that floating-point values can acquire a small amount of error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de igualdade compensa o fato de que os valores de ponto flutuante podem adquirir uma pequena quantidade de erro quando operado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> blue channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal azul <see langword="sRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> blue channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="sRGB" /> azul valor de canal do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>, the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>, o `sRGB` azul canal, que é modificado, o `ScRGB` canal azul, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> channels of the color to within the gamut of 0 to 1, if they are outside that range.
trans-unit.target: Define os canais <see langword="ScRGB" /> da cor para dentro do intervalo de gama de 0 a 1, se estão fora dele.

trans-unit.source: The gamut of the `ScRGB` color space is larger than the clamp range, so the use of this method may result in the loss of color information.
trans-unit.target: A gama do `ScRGB` espaço de cor é maior que o intervalo de fixação, portanto o uso desse método pode resultar na perda de informações de cor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o perfil de cor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] da cor.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de cor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] da cor.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: Um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] perfil de cor contém um perfil de sistema de cores para um determinado aplicativo ou dispositivo, como uma impressora de cor.

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: Este perfil é comparado a um perfil comum que por sua vez, pode ser mapeado para os perfis individuais de outros dispositivos.

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o sistema de cores usado pelo dispositivo de um computador para corresponder as cores de outros aplicativos e dispositivos na mesma ou em outros sistemas de computador.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> são idênticas.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado a essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure and is equivalent to this color.
trans-unit.target: Testa se o objeto especificado é uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> e é equivalente a esta cor.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure and is identical to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado é uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> e é idêntico à estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de ponto flutuante podem adquirir um certo grau de erro quando eles são operados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operador e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operador não compensar isso e, portanto, não pode retornar um resultado booleano esperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> método usa um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensa esse erro de aritmético de ponto flutuante, retornando `true` para obter uma comparação de dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas que são praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem ser diferentes por uma quantidade minuscule.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada à estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure is identical to this color.
trans-unit.target: Testa se a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> especificada é idêntica a esta cor.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure is identical to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> especificada e é idêntica à estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> são idênticas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are exactly identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="color1" /> e <paramref name="color2" /> são exatamente idênticas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de ponto flutuante podem adquirir um certo grau de erro quando eles são operados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operador e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operador não compensar isso e, portanto, não pode retornar um resultado booleano esperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> método usa um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensa esse erro de aritmético de ponto flutuante, retornando `true` para obter uma comparação de dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas que são praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem ser diferentes por uma quantidade minuscule.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.A" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.A" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The red channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.R" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal vermelho, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.R" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The green channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.G" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal verde, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.G" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The blue channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.B" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal azul, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.B" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha channel and color channel values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> usando os valores de canal alfa e valores de canal de cor <see langword="sRGB" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A> method allows you to specify the alpha channel; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> method uses a default value of 255 for the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A> método permite que você especifique o canal alfa; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> método usa o valor padrão de 255 para o canal alfa.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa da cor determina a quantidade de transparência da cor.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 255 indica que a cor é completamente opaca, e um valor de 0 indica que a cor é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel for the new color,a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa da nova cor, um valor entre 0 e 1.

trans-unit.source: A collection of values that specify the color channels for the new color.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de valores que especificam os canais de cor da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: These values map to the <c>profileUri</c>.
trans-unit.target: Esses valores são mapeados para o <c>profileUri</c>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile for the new color.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de cor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified alpha channel, color channel values, and color profile.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> usando o canal alfa, os valores de canal de cor e o perfil de cor especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: Um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] perfil de cor contém um perfil de sistema de cores para um determinado aplicativo ou dispositivo, como uma impressora de cor.

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: Este perfil é comparado a um perfil comum que por sua vez, pode ser mapeado para os perfis individuais de outros dispositivos.

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o sistema de cores usado pelo dispositivo de um computador para corresponder as cores de outros aplicativos e dispositivos na mesma ou em outros sistemas de computador.

trans-unit.target: O canal vermelho <see langword="sRGB" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.R" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> usando os valores de canal de cor <see langword="sRGB" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values and an alpha channel value of 255.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> com os valores especificados e um valor de canal alfa de 255.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A> method allows you to specify the alpha channel; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> method uses a default value of 1 for the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A> método permite que você especifique o canal alfa; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> método usa o valor padrão de 1 para o canal alfa.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa da cor determina a quantidade de transparência da cor.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 1 indica que a cor é completamente opaca, e um valor de 0 indica que a cor é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: The sRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the ScRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: Os canais sRGB (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e os canais ScRGB (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the sRGB red channel, is modified the ScRGB red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is transformed to the equivalent value.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, o canal sRGB vermelho, é modificada canal ScRGB vermelho, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, for transformada para o valor equivalente.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> método para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa de <see langword="ScRGB" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> red channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal vermelho <see langword="ScRGB" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> green channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal verde <see langword="ScRGB" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> blue channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O canal azul <see langword="ScRGB" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB" />, da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel and color channel values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> usando os valores de canal alfa e valores de canal de cor <see langword="ScRGB" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa da cor determina a quantidade de transparência da cor.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 1 indica que a cor é completamente opaca, e um valor de 0 indica que a cor é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: A collection of values that specify the color channels for the new color.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de valores que especificam os canais de cor da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: These values map to the <c>profileUri</c>.
trans-unit.target: Esses valores são mapeados para o <c>profileUri</c>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile for the new color.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de cor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] da nova cor.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified color channel values and color profile.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> usando os valores de canal de cor e o perfil de cor especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values and an alpha channel value of 1.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> com os valores especificados e um valor de canal alfa de 1.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: Um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] perfil de cor contém um perfil de sistema de cores para um determinado aplicativo ou dispositivo, como uma impressora de cor.

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: Este perfil é comparado a um perfil comum que por sua vez, pode ser mapeado para os perfis individuais de outros dispositivos.

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o sistema de cores usado pelo dispositivo de um computador para corresponder as cores de outros aplicativos e dispositivos na mesma ou em outros sistemas de computador.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromValues%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromValues%2A> método para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> green channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal verde <see langword="sRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> green channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="sRGB" /> verde valor de canal do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, o `sRGB` canal de verde, é modificada, o `ScRGB` canal verde, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color channel values of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de canal de cor da cor.

trans-unit.source: An array of color channel values.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de valores de canal de cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> to be multiplied.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser multiplicado.

trans-unit.source: The value to multiply by.
trans-unit.target: O valor pelo qual multiplicar.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the alpha, red, blue, and green channels of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica os canais alfa, vermelho, azul e verde da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> especificada pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas são adicionadas juntos, adicionando os canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de primeiro para os canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de segundo.

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o canal alfa de `color1` e o canal alfa de `color2` são adicionados juntos para produzir o canal alfa da cor resultante.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é feito com os canais vermelhos, verdes e azuis para produzir canais de vermelho, verdes e azuis a nova cor.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Add%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Add%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> são idênticas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are exactly identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="color1" /> e <paramref name="color2" /> são exatamente idênticas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de ponto flutuante podem adquirir um certo grau de erro quando eles são operados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operador e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operador não compensar isso e, portanto, não pode retornar um resultado booleano esperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> método usa um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensa esse erro de aritmético de ponto flutuante, retornando `true` para obter uma comparação de dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas que são praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem ser diferentes por uma quantidade minuscule.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are not identical.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> não são idênticas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="color1" /> e <paramref name="color2" /> não forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de ponto flutuante podem adquirir um certo grau de erro quando eles são operados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operador e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operador não compensar isso e, portanto, não pode retornar um resultado booleano esperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> método usa um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensa esse erro de aritmético de ponto flutuante, retornando `true` para obter uma comparação de dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas que são praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem ser diferentes por uma quantidade minuscule.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> a ser multiplicado.

trans-unit.target: Multiplica os canais alfa, vermelho, azul e verde da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> especificada pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> de uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de subtração.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are subtracted from one another by subtracting the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color from the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas são subtraídas uns dos outros, subtraindo os canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de segundo dos canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor do primeiro.

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color2` is subtracted from the alpha channel of `color1` to produce the alpha channel of the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o canal alfa de `color2` é subtraído do canal alfa de `color1` para produzir o canal alfa de resultante <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é feito com os canais vermelhos, verdes e azuis para produzir os canais vermelhos, verdes e azuis do novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Subtract%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Subtract%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> red channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal vermelho <see langword="sRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> red channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="sRGB" /> valor canal vermelho a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, o `sRGB` canal vermelho, for modificado, o `ScRGB` canal vermelho, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal alfa <see langword="ScRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de canal alfa <see langword="ScRGB" /> da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, um valor entre 0 e 1.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura determina a quantidade de transparência de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> tem.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 1 indica a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> é completamente opaco e um valor de 0 indica que a cor é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, o `sRGB` canal alfa, é modificado, o `ScRGB` canal alfa, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ScRGB blue channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal azul ScRGB da cor.

trans-unit.source: The ScRGB red channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de canal vermelho ScRGB do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 1.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>, the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>, o `sRGB` azul canal, que é modificado, o `ScRGB` canal azul, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> green channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal verde <see langword="ScRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> green channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="ScRGB" /> verde valor de canal do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 1.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, o `sRGB` canal de verde, é modificada, o `ScRGB` canal verde, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> red channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de canal vermelho <see langword="ScRGB" /> da cor.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> red channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="ScRGB" /> valor canal vermelho a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 1.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura são sincronizados de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, o `sRGB` canal vermelho, for modificado, o `ScRGB` canal vermelho, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente usando 0-1 do valor de intervalo que o `Sc` esquema oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to be subtracted from.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> da qual subtrair.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to subtract from <c>color1</c>.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> para subtrair de <c>color1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> de uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de subtração.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are subtracted from one another by subtracting the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color from the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estruturas são subtraídas uns dos outros, subtraindo os canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de segundo dos canais alfa, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor do primeiro.

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color2` is subtracted from the alpha channel of `color1` to produce the alpha channel of the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o canal alfa de `color2` é subtraído do canal alfa de `color1` para produzir o canal alfa de resultante <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é feito com os canais vermelhos, verdes e azuis para produzir os canais vermelhos, verdes e azuis do novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: O formato a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic) para usar o formato padrão definido para o tipo da implementação <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" />.

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: O provedor a ser usado para formatar o valor.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic) para obter as informações de formato numérico da configuração de localidade atual do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Formata o valor da instância atual usando o formato especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: O valor da instância atual no formato especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the color by using the <see langword="sRGB" /> channels.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da cor usando os canais <see langword="sRGB" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the color using the <see langword="sRGB" /> channels.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da cor usando os canais <see langword="sRGB" />.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the color.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de caracteres da cor.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation represents the <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> values in hex form, prefixes with the <c>#</c> character, and starts with the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão representa os valores <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> em formato hexadecimal, prefixos com o caractere <c>#</c> e começa com o canal alfa.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Color.ToString" /> value for <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.AliceBlue" /> is <c>#FFF0F8FF</c>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o valor <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Color.ToString" /> para <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.AliceBlue" /> é <c>FFF0F8FF #</c>.

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: Informações de formatação específicas da cultura.

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the color by using the <see langword="sRGB" /> channels and the specified format provider.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da cor usando os canais <see langword="sRGB" /> e o provedor de formato especificado.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the color.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de caracteres da cor.
